attributes.action: Empower theatres to open in a Covid safe manner. Venues are not all the same.
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of people who’s livelihoods rely on this industry. If pubs can open safely so can theatres especially if they are outdoor.
attributes.background: The Government decision to allow theatres to open but with no live performance makes no sense. All venues are different. Cornwall for example has a large number of outdoor venues . Please allow  venues to positively manage and safely reopen to the public with live performance. Support live theatre.
